Name: Lifeup a
Description: A PSI healing technique that restores between 40 and 80HP.

Name: Lifeup b
Description: A PSI healing technique that restores between 120 and 160HP.

Name: Lifeup g
Description: A PSI healing technique that restores a target's HP to its maximum.

Name: Lifeup O
Description: A PSI healing technique that restores 240  - 300HP to all party members.

Name: Lifeup pi
Description: An ultimate PSI healing technique that restores the HP of all party members to their maximum.

Name: Freeze a
Description: A PSI attack that chills a foe to the bone. Deals between 40 and 60 points of damage.

Name: Freeze b
Description: A PSI attack that chills a foe to the bone. Deals between 160 and 180 points of damage.

Name: Freeze g
Description: A PSI attack that chills a foe to the bone. Deals between 280 and 300 points of damage.

Name: Freeze O
Description: A PSI attack that chills a foe to the bone. Deals between 360 and 400 points of damage.

Name: Freeze pi
Description: An ultimate PSI attack that chills a foe to the bone. Deals between 550 and 600 points of damage.

Name: Fire a
Description: A PSI attack that chars a foe in a pillar of flames. Deals between 30 and 60 points of damage to all foes.

Name: Fire b
Description: A PSI attack that chars a foe in a pillar of flames. Deals between 120 and 150 points of damage to all foes.

Name: Fire g
Description: A PSI attack that chars a foe in a pillar of flames. Deals between 200 and 220 points of damage to all foes.

Name: Fire O
Description: A PSI attack that chars a foe in a pillar of flames. Deals between 280 and 320 points of damage to all foes.

Name: Fire pi
Description: An ultimate PSI attack that chars a foe in a pillar of flames. Deals between 450 and 500 points of damage to all foes.

Name: Thunder a
Description: A PSI attack that generates a shocking jolt of electricity. Deals 100 points of damage to a foe[COMMA] but has a low accuracy.

Name: Thunder b
Description: A PSI attack that generates two shocking jolts of electricity. Each jolt deals 150 points of damage to a foe[COMMA] but have a low accuracy.

Name: Thunder g
Description: A PSI attack that generates three shocking jolts of electricity. Each jolt deals 170 points of damage to a foe[COMMA] but have a low accuracy.

Name: Thunder O
Description: A PSI attack that generates four shocking jolts of electricity. Each jolt deals 180 points of damage to a foe[COMMA] but have a low accuracy.

Name: Thunder pi
Description: An ultimate PSI attack that generates five shocking jolts of electricity. Each jolt deals 200 points of damage to a foe[COMMA] but have a low accuracy.

Name: 4th D. Slip
Description: The user creates a rift by which the party can escape from the current battle. Has a higher chance of success than simply running away.

Name: Super Healing
Description: Fully restores a fainted target to full HP.

Name: Healing a
Description: A PSI healing technique that cures the body of poison and cold.

Name: Healing b
Description: A PSI healing technique that cures the body of poison[COMMA] cold[COMMA] stone.

Name: Healing g
Description: A PSI healing technique that cures the body of poison[COMMA] cold[COMMA] stone. Also has a small chance of reviving a fainted ally.

Name: Healing O
Description: A PSI healing technique that cures the body of all status afflictions[COMMA] and resurrects a fainted party member to half of their maximum HP.

Name: Healing pi
Description: An ultimate PSI healing technique that cures all status afflictions on the party. Revives all fainted party members to half HP.

Name: Shield a
Description: Creates a shield against physical attacks[COMMA] causing partial damage nullification.

Name: Shield b
Description: Creates a shield against physical attacks[COMMA] causing physical damage to be reduced by half.

Name: PSI Shield a
Description: Creates a shield against PSI attacks[COMMA] causing partial damage nullification.

Name: PSI Shield b
Description: Creates a shield against PSI attacks[COMMA] causing PSI damage to be reduced by half.
